Html:
Hi, I tried to add GMap.NET.WindowsForms.dll to my Visual Studio IDE toolbox like montionned in this tuto: http://geekswithblogs.net/saifkhan/archive/2011/08/03/using-gmap.net-ndash-great-maps-for-windows-forms-amp-presentation.aspx

but I can't drag and drop the GMapControl, because it's disabled. 

When dowloading the GMap.NET.WindowsForms.zip I can't find the System.Data.SQLite.DLL maybe it's because of that. 

How can I solve this problem please?
you are doing something wrong, god knows what ;}
I've tried this several times.  But how come I don't find System.Data.SQLite.DLL in the files downloaded?

Hello

You need to add GMap.NET.WindowsForms.dll to your toolbox so to do this follow these steps :

-> Right click on the toolbox

-> Select Choose item

-> Browse to GMap[...].dll

-> Add it.

Enjoy :)
